name: Fire Away
description:
Wally is a guardian of the Spirit Tree. He is an elite fire magician with one mission: Protect the tree. Help him fire away the never-ending slime invasions which gets stronger every wave. 

--Features--

Magic-based fighting game

Easy to pick up and play

Try to defend the Spirit Tree as long as possible

Please try out this browser version with continuous wave difficulty progression.Reviews are greatly appreciated. Thank you for playing.

Follow us @BlueKumaGames

Email: bluekumagames@gmail.com
